data.message: why are there so many scams on facebook. i had like 3 people trying to tell me i won money from facebook and they act like they work for facebook

replies.message: Hi Rick. Thanks for reaching out. To learn how to report these messages to us, please visit: http://bit.ly/2bV0S9p. Let us know if you have any more questions. -Azaria

You can report them but odds are they will say theres nothing wrong with it. Atleast thats my experience everytime i report those Amen scammers who steal picks of dead and disabled people. Once even reported a scam contest page that pretended to be a legit contest page telling people they won stuff and got the same Nothing Wrong repsonse. Had a friend share a post about how the Stalone thing was a hoax and not to believe it yet to FB that was against the rules.
